original_text: And their children spake half in the speech of Ashdod, and could not speak in the Jews' language, but according to the language of each people.
korean_text: 그들의 자녀가 아스돗 방언을 절반쯤은 하여도 유다 방언은 못하니 그 하는 말이 각 족속의 방언이므로

sentences.original_text: and could not speak in the Jews' language
but according to the language of each people
